mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCTID ASC
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCTID = #{productID} ORDER BY PRODUCTID ASC
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY LIKE #{category} ORDER BY PRODUCTID ASC
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCTNAME LIKE #{productName} ORDER BY PRODUCTID ASC
